snippet.title: Kyurinaga´s Revenge - Gameplay Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Kyurinaga's Revenge is a 2D-based game with lots of platforming, action and puzzles.     

www.recotech.es

Battle alongside our two heroes: The samurai Kaoru Tamanegi and the street fighter Broccoli Joe all across the Feudal Japan in their new adventure!

www.recotech.es


3D platforming with high doses of action.
3 special Combat Modes
Lots of challenging puzzles and frenetic combat.
New characters and enemies.
You can play solo or with a friend in a local co-op mode.
A 2D cartoonish and engaging living world, set in the Feudal Japan.

Kyurinaga´s Revenge and the Kyurinaga´s Revenge logo are registered trademarks of Recotechnology
